歫字的基本解释

歫
jù
古同“拒”，抵抗，抗拒。
古同“距”（ａ．至，到；距离；ｂ．跳跃）。

歫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》其吕切，上語，羣。］
(1)同“距”。超越。
(2)同“距”。离开；间隔。
(3)同“拒”。拒绝；抵拒。

歫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歫； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页576第13
【唐韻】其呂切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】臼許切，?音巨。【說文】止也。从止巨聲。一曰搶也。【徐曰】搶，頭撞地也。一曰超歫。　又【玉篇】違也，戾也，至也。與距通。【前漢·食貨志】元龜歫冉，長尺二寸。【註】冉，龜甲緣。歫，至也，度背兩邊緣尺二寸也。【揚雄·羽獵賦】騰空虛歫連卷。【註】師古曰：歫，卽距字。

歫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
歫字的起名意思

暂无。

歫
Basic explanation of words
歫
jù
Gu Tong "rejected", resisted, resisted.
The ancient same "distance" (a. to, to; distance; b. jump).
歫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" Qi Lu Qi, Shangyu, group. ]
(1) The same "distance". Beyond.
(2) The same "distance". Leave; interval.
(3) Same as "reject". Reject; resist.
歫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Zhizi] 　歫; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 576 13
[Tang Yun] Qi Lu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Positive Rhyme] Xu Qi, a huge sound. [Said the text] Stop also. From the loud sound. One said to grab it. [Xu Yue] If you grab it, you hit the ground with your head. One said, Chaoxian.　[Jade Chapter] Violation, 戾 Ye, Zhi Ye. And distance pass. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Yuan Gui Xiaoran, two inches long. [Note] Ran, the tortoise shell margin. Xiao, Zhiye, the two sides of the back and the feet are two inches. 【Yang Xiong·Yu Lie Fu】Tengkong Xuxiu scrolls continuously. [Note] Shigu said: 歫, 卽 distance characters.

Name meaning
Nothing.
jù
гл.
1) вм. 距 (отстоять от...; быть отделённым)
2) вм. 拒 (отталкивать; отбивать, давать отпор)
